entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WATCH , Carleton-sur-Mer
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:52 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -8.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Charlo 12:00 PM AST Saturday 28 January 2023
Temperature: -8.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.8 kPa falling
Humidity: 88 %
Wind Chill: -13
Dewpoint: -9.8°C
Wind: E 10 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. High zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few flurries beginning early this afternoon. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High zero. Wind chill minus 12 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending late this evening then clearing. Risk of snow squalls this evening. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming west 40 km/h gusting to 60 this evening then diminishing to 20 overnight. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Light snow. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the morning then light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023
